author: Samantha Bresnahan, CNN
title: Covering the coronavirus pandemic: CNN correspondents reflect on how we got here
description: As the entire world grapples with the effects of the coronavirus outbreak, it is easy to lose sight of how we got here. There are not many news events in recent memory that have come close to the far-reaching implications in terms of our public health, social…
